ComicInfo.Summary: Michael Jackson appears in 'E.T.,' 'The A-Team,' and 'Star Trek.'

ComicInfo.Title: The Date; Cracked Hits the Jackpot with These Gambling Gems!; The Sulk; Chalk Bored; 10 Reasons Why Arnold Should Be Recalled; Rapper Remakes of Hollywood Blockbusters!; They Never Seem to Mention...; If Michael Jackson Had Starred In...; Buy American or It's Bye, America!; Who Do You Think You're Fooling?; It'll Be a Cold Day in Hell, When...; Reality Bites; The Last People on Earth You'd Ever Want to Be!; Celeb Recipes; Cracked Separates Men from Boys!; School Daze; The Mumbler; What's Up with That?
